snippet.title: MARIO + RABBIDS SPARKS OF HOPE: Team Trailer
snippet.description:
"Only the most extravagant team of Heroes can rekindle the sparks of hope across the galaxy!

Rediscover Mario & the Rabbids Heroes and build your dream team of three characters from an eclectic roster of nine, including all-time favourites Mario, Rabbid Peach, Luigi, Rabbid Mario, Peach, Rabbid Luigi and some unexpected newcomers like Edge & Rabbid Rosalina! Bowser, the troublemaker, is also forced to join forces with the team and he is not happy about it!

Take advantage of each Hero's special abilities to outwit even the strongest enemies in battle. And combine forces with the Sparks, whose immense energy makes anything possible… for better OR worse! 

Join the mission as Mario + Rabbids® Sparks of Hope is now available for pre-order on: https://www.mariorabbids.com/buy?ucid=SMO-ID_152099&maltcode=brand_C2W_SMO_facebook___MRSH____&addinfo=media_some_facebook

LEARN MORE ABOUT  MARIO + RABBIDS SPARKS OF HOPE ON: www.mariorabbids.com 

FOLLOW US ON: 
Instagram: www.mariorabbids.com/instagram 
Facebook: www.mariorabbids.com/facebook
Twitter: www.mariorabbids.com/twitter
Forums: www.mariorabbids.com/forums"
